mainBoard.name: Black Lotus
mainBoard.originalText: Adds 3 mana of any single color of your choice to your mana pool, then is discarded. Tapping this artifact can be played as an interrupt.
mainBoard.text: {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add three mana of any one color.

mainBoard.name: Detonate
mainBoard.originalText: Targets any artifact; X is the casting cost of target artifact. Target artifact is destroyed, and Detonate does X points of damage to artifact's controller. Artifact creatures destroyed in this manner may not be regenerated.

rulings.text: If the artifact becomes an illegal target before resolution, then no damage is done.

mainBoard.text: Destroy target artifact with mana value X. It can't be regenerated. Detonate deals X damage to that artifact's controller.

foreignData.name: Entzauberung
foreignData.text: Zerstöre eine Verzauberung oder ein Artefakt.

mainBoard.name: Disenchant
mainBoard.originalText: Target enchantment or artifact is destroyed.

rulings.text: This is not modal. If the target changes from an artifact to an enchantment or vice versa, this still destroys it.

foreignData.name: Erdbeben
foreignData.text: Das Erdbeben fügt jedem Spieler und jeder Kreatur ohne Flugfähigkeit X Schadenspunkte zu.

mainBoard.name: Earthquake
mainBoard.originalText: Does X damage to each player and each non-flying creature in play.

rulings.text: Whether or not a creature is without flying is only checked on resolution.

mainBoard.text: Earthquake deals X damage to each creature without flying and each player.

mainBoard.flavorText: "What do you have that I cannot obtain?" —Mairsil, called the Pretender
mainBoard.name: Fellwar Stone
mainBoard.originalText: ocT: Add 1 mana to your mana pool. This mana may be of any color that any of opponent's lands can produce. This ability is played as an interrupt.

rulings.text: It only produces one mana even if the land can produce more than one.
The ability can be activated if the opponent has no lands that produce mana, but the effect will not be able to generate any mana.
This works even if the opponent's lands are tapped. It only checks what kinds of mana can be produced, not if the abilities that produce them are usable right now.

Fellwar Stone checks the effects of all mana-producing abilities of lands your opponents control, but it doesn't check their costs. For example, Vivid Crag has the ability "{T}, Remove a charge counter from Vivid Crag: Add one mana of any color." If an opponent controls Vivid Crag and you control Fellwar Stone, you can tap Fellwar Stone for any color of mana. It doesn't matter whether Vivid Crag has a charge counter on it, and it doesn't matter whether it's untapped.

Fellwar Stone doesn't care about any restrictions or riders your opponents' lands (such as Ancient Ziggurat or Hall of the Bandit Lord) put on the mana they produce. It just cares about colors of mana.
The colors of mana are white, blue, black, red, and green. Fellwar Stone can't be tapped for colorless mana, even if a land an opponent controls could produce colorless mana.

When determining what colors of mana your opponents' lands could produce, take into account any applicable replacement effects that would apply to those lands' mana abilities (such as Contamination's effect, for example). If there is more than one, consider them in any possible order.

mainBoard.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color that a land an opponent controls could produce.

mainBoard.name: Forest
mainBoard.originalText: ocT: Add {G} to your mana pool.

mainBoard.name: Forest
mainBoard.originalText: ocT: Add {G} to your mana pool.

mainBoard.name: Forest
mainBoard.originalText: ocT: Add {G} to your mana pool.

foreignData.name: Heilbalsam
foreignData.text: Gib Dir oder einem Spieler Deiner Wahl 3 Lebenspunkte, oder verhindere bis zu 3 Schadenspunkte bei einer Kreatur oder einem Spieler.

mainBoard.name: Healing Salve
mainBoard.originalText: Gain 3 life, or prevent up to 3 damage from being dealt to a single target.
mainBoard.text:
Choose one —
• Target player gains 3 life.
• Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.

foreignData.name: Hurrikan
foreignData.text: Der Hurrikan fügt allen Spielern und allen fliegenden Kreaturen X Schadenspunkte zu.

mainBoard.name: Hurricane
mainBoard.originalText: All players and flying creatures suffer X damage.

rulings.text: Whether or not a creature has flying is only checked on resolution.

mainBoard.text: Hurricane deals X damage to each creature with flying and each player.

mainBoard.flavorText: "Any scrap of compassion that still existed in my soul was permanently snuffed out when they cast me out into the flames." —Mairsil, called the Pretender
mainBoard.name: Inferno
mainBoard.originalText: Inferno does 6 damage to all players and all creatures.
mainBoard.text: Inferno deals 6 damage to each creature and each player.

mainBoard.flavorText: Valuing scholarship above all else, the inhabitants of the Ivory Tower reward those who sacrifice power for knowledge.
mainBoard.name: Ivory Tower
mainBoard.originalText: During your upkeep phase, gain 1 life for each card in your hand above four.

rulings.text: If you have four or fewer cards in your hand when Ivory Tower's ability resolves, the ability has no effect.

mainBoard.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you gain X life, where X is the number of cards in your hand minus 4.

foreignData.name: Lebendes Artefakt
foreignData.text:
Lege eine Lebens-Spielmarke auf das Artefakt für jeden Lebenspunkt, den Du verlierst.
0: Entferne während Deiner Versorgungsphase eine Lebensmarke vom Artefakt und gewinne einen Lebenspunkt zurück. Du kannst während jeder Deiner Versorgungsphasen nur eine Lebensmarke umwandeln.

mainBoard.name: Living Artifact
mainBoard.originalText: Put a counter on target artifact for each life you lose. During your upkeep you may trade one counter for one life, but you can only trade in one counter during each of your upkeeps.

rulings.text: Does not trigger on loss of life, just on damage.
You can cast it targeting your opponent's artifacts. The controller of the Aura (not the controller of the artifact) controls the Living Artifact ability.

mainBoard.text:
Enchant artifact
Whenever you're dealt damage, put that many vitality counters on this Aura.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may remove a vitality counter from this Aura. If you do, you gain 1 life.

mainBoard.name: Mountain
mainBoard.originalText: Tap to add {R} to your mana pool.

mainBoard.name: Mox Emerald
mainBoard.originalText: Add 1 green mana to your mana pool. Tapping this artifact can be played as an interrupt.

mainBoard.name: Mox Pearl
mainBoard.originalText: Add 1 white mana to your mana pool. Tapping this artifact can be played as an interrupt.

mainBoard.name: Mox Ruby
mainBoard.originalText: Add 1 red mana to your mana pool. Tapping this artifact can be played as an interrupt.

mainBoard.flavorText: An early inspiration for Urza, Tocasia's Onulets contained magical essences that could be cannibalized after they stopped functioning.
mainBoard.name: Onulet
mainBoard.originalText: If Onulet goes to the graveyard, its controller gains 2 life.
mainBoard.text: When this creature dies, you gain 2 life.

mainBoard.name: Plains
mainBoard.originalText: ocT: Add {W} to your mana pool.

mainBoard.name: Plains
mainBoard.originalText: ocT: Add {W} to your mana pool.

mainBoard.name: Plains
mainBoard.originalText: ocT: Add {W} to your mana pool.

foreignData.name: Umkehrschaden
foreignData.text: Aller Schaden, den Du bislang in diesem Zug von einer bestimmten Quelle erhalten hast, wird zu Deinem Lebenspunkten hinzuaddiert statt abgezogen. Wenn Du in diesem Zug noch weiteren Schaden aus dieser Quelle erhältst, wird dieser ganz normal behandelt.

mainBoard.name: Reverse Damage
mainBoard.originalText: All damage you have taken from any one source this turn is added to your life total instead of subtracted from it.

rulings.text: It only affects damage dealt by the source one time. If the source damages you a second time this turn, the damage will not be reversed.

mainBoard.text: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage. You gain life equal to the damage prevented this way.

foreignData.name: Sonnenring
foreignData.text: {T}: Erhöhe Deinen Manavorrat um 2 farblose Mana. Spiele diese Eigenschaft wie einen Unterbrechungszauber.

mainBoard.name: Sol Ring
mainBoard.originalText: ocT: Add 2 colorless mana to your mana pool. This ability is played as an interrupt.

foreignData.name: Lebensquelle
foreignData.text: Du oder ein anderer Spieler Deiner Wahl erhält X Lebenspunkte dazu.

mainBoard.name: Stream of Life
mainBoard.originalText: Target player gains X life.

mainBoard.name: Wrath of God
mainBoard.originalText: All creatures in play are buried.
mainBoard.text: Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated.
